data_handeling.generators.threadsafe_generator(f)[source]¶

A decorator that takes a generator function and makes it thread-safe.

class data_handeling.generators.threadsafe_iter(it)[source]¶

Bases: object

Takes an iterator/generator and makes it thread-safe by serialising call to the next method of given iterator/generator.

data_handeling.tools module¶

:w Created on Tue Apr 9 10:19:59 2019

@author: Keith Butler

data_handeling.tools.build_list_images(datapath, types=None)[source]¶

Builds a list of all image files in a given directory

Parameters

  • datapath – the location to search

  • types – a tuple of the extensions to search, if unspecified a list of defaults is checked

Returns

a list of the datapaths to the images

Return type

paths

data_handeling.tools.normalise_discritise_data(img, mask, flag_multi_class=False, num_class=2, debug=False)[source]¶

Processes the image data to make it ready for the NN. Converts mask into a range of integer values. Normalises the image values.

Parameters

  • img – The image as an array

  • mask – The mask as an array

  • flag_multi_class – boolean, is this a multiclass or binary classification

  • num_class – integer, the number of classes

Returns

The image normalised mask: The mask converted to intergers by class

Return type

img

data_handeling.tools.undersample_dataframe(df, label='label')[source]¶

Balances a class imbalanced dataframe by undersampling. Takes the size of the smallest class and cuts all classes to that size, randomly selecting members to fit the proportion.

Parameters

  • df – The input dataframe (Pandas dataframe object)

  • label – The label of the column to sort by (string, default label)

Returns

The class balanced dataframe (Pandas dataframe object)

Return type

df_bal
